body_html:
Hi @athuldevin, as mentioned above, tf.nn.rnn_cell has moved to tf.contrib.rnn.

What you should actually do to solve the problem however is to pull your repository / grab the latest version of the code at https://github.com/tensorflow/models/blob/master/tutorials/rnn/translate/seq2seq_model.py. Your current version is out of date, and there have been a few other bugs fixed since then.
body_text:
Hi @athuldevin, as mentioned above, tf.nn.rnn_cell has moved to tf.contrib.rnn.
What you should actually do to solve the problem however is to pull your repository / grab the latest version of the code at https://github.com/tensorflow/models/blob/master/tutorials/rnn/translate/seq2seq_model.py. Your current version is out of date, and there have been a few other bugs fixed since then.
body:
Hi @athuldevin, as mentioned above, `tf.nn.rnn_cell` has moved to `tf.contrib.rnn`.

What you should actually do to solve the problem however is to pull your repository / grab the latest version of the code at https://github.com/tensorflow/models/blob/master/tutorials/rnn/translate/seq2seq_model.py. Your current version is out of date, and there have been a few other bugs fixed since then.
